attributes.action: refuse planning permission for the development of Candlemas Pond, Beaconsfield
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Planning permission is currently being sought for the construction of a development of apartments and townhouses on the site of the three houses adjoining Candlemas Pond, Station Road, Beaconsfield.  This development risks irreparably damaging the fragile ecosystem of this valuable local landmark, and should not be allowed to proceed.
